modName: T71 TANK TOPS with HDT for S.A.M.
summary: This mod adds about 60 male tank tops variety with HDT for Shape Atlas for Men.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
This mod requires:
S.A.M. and HDT Butt Breast Belly Bounce for SAM
and ALL their requirements.


Installation:
NMM: As usually
Manual: Drop in data/ both files and activate the .esp


How to obtain them:
Look the screenshot for a clue -_-
Near the chest there are 3 soell tomes:
One spell allows to open the chest anytime, anywhere
the others two allow to equip a random tank top both player and/or target.
(Obviously these spells affect only men)

A veryÂ  special Thanks to:
Hymnaru's Clothing Project for S.A.M
for original mod.

This mod can be used in conjunction with
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69504/?]T71 BOXERS with HDT for S.A.M.[/url]

Have Fun![/center]
author: Tiranno71
